body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Fees & Passes              Fees & Passes              Fees for tours: Adults $12 Seniors (65+) $10 Students $8 Military $8 Children (12 and under) Free National Trust for Historic Preservation $8 National Park Service $8 For information about Group Tours for 10 or more, please call 401.847.4794, ext. 23 Tours begin at the Loeb Visitors Center located on Spring Street, adjacent to the Synagogue. For more information, please visit the Synagogue's website.
title: Touro Synagogue National Historic Site: Fees & Passes
